job_details.degree_required: Engineering degree with 8+ years of experience in Java Springboot

jd: From: Ram, Atlantis ram.a@atlantisitgroup.com Reply to: ram.a@atlantisitgroup.com Role: Java Tech Lead Location: Philadelphia, PA Duration: 7+ Months Must-have skills for this role: 1. Java Springboot 2. CICD 3. NoSQL Years of experience required for each skill: - Java Springboot - 5+ years. - CICD - 3+ Years. - NoSQL - 3+ years. • Work location: Philadelphia, USA. • Will this role work remote/In Office/Hybrid (in office & remote): In Office. • Does the resource have to be Local: Yes. • Does this role have any Visa Restrictions? No. • Does this role require vaccination mandate? Not required. Primary job duties/responsibilities: - Ability to communicate with Product Owners and Business Owners to understand requirements. - Lead and mentor a team of engineers, providing technical guidance. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams including tech architects, analysts, and software engineers. - Ensuring timely delivery and high-quality outcomes. - Design & development of backend APIs. Nice-to-have skills: 1. AWS 2. Scrum 3. Message brokers • What type of education is needed for this position? Engineering degree with 8+ years of experience in Java Springboot. • Is industry experience needed for this role and why? Yes, this is lead role which is responsible for deliveries for two OrderTech teams. • What are the chances for extension? 50% • Will the client pay for travel and expenses? No.
